title: We need to be nicer
body:
In almost every single one of my games I end up playing with someone who is having a go at another person, for numerous reasons; not ganking, "feeding", and just doing "bad" in general. I understand your frustration at people because they are not playing exactly how you would like them to play like, but that's life if a player is having a difficult time don't criticize them, encourage them, help them out, roam or gank them. They don't need someone typing to them that they are "terrible", "trash", and "cancer". Just because someone isn't having their best game yelling at them won't help. If they aren't ganking you, be nice, I know for sure if someone calls me "a trash jungler" in all chat, and then beg me for a gank, I am for sure not going to come help you. Saying something like "Hey jg, could you please gank me when possible :)" is much better. 

Overall, this was a bit of a rant, but please, please, please, stop saying stuff like this to people and then the next game when you see a teammate doing the exact same as you were doing you say the community is trash.

Please stop. Let's make this community better.

replies.body:
Back in season 2, on NA server (before OCE existed), I had an account banned for 256 years. I admit I was toxic, usually in response to others being dicks.
I don't bitch anymore, I'm a total team player. I use the mute option frequently.
I have had no action taken against me for many years, I'm honour level 3 atm.

Manners are free, bitching only makes you lose more games.

Positive attitudes, even when losing, is what turns games around.

In saying that, the last game I played, I carried hard (got an S), everyone on my team gave honour at the end, and I got none.
Suck it up and keep playing like a champ.
[http://matchhistory.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-details/OC1/181114927/200439361?tab=overview]

Tears won't get you anywhere but Salt Lake City.

Thank you for your reply, I have also been banned on the NA server before. I was being very rude in almost every game, but only towards people who were mean to my mates and myself. Gave me a scare, and now I try my best to be the nicest I can be.

However, like you said, most the time you can be so kind to everyone, but in the end, your team can easily forget and not a single person honour you (even if you carry). I feel like the honour system still doesn't work.
